name: Huawei nova 15 Pro
highlights:
Exp. release 2025, December 27
202g, 6.9mm thickness
HarmonyOS 6.0
256GB/512GB storage, no card slot

BODY.Build: Glass front, aluminum alloy frame, aluminum back
BODY: IP65 dust tight and water resistant (low pressure water jets)

DISPLAY.Type: LTPO OLED, 1B colors, HDR Vivid, 120Hz, 2160Hz PWM, 4000 nits (peak)
DISPLAY.Protection: Aluminosilicate glass (256GB only); Kunlun Glass edition

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.8, 24mm (wide), PDAF, OIS
12 MP, f/2.4, 69mm (telephoto), PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom
13 MP, f/2.2, 13mm, 120Ëš (ultrawide), AF
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Laser AF, color spectrum sensor, Dual-LED flash, panorama, HDR

COMMS.Bluetooth: 6.0, A2DP, LE, L2HC (320-960 kbps HD audio)
COMMS.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS (L1), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a+B2b), GALILEO (E1+E5a+E5b), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, compass

BATTERY.Charging:
100W wired, SCP, UFCS, PD, PPS, QC
5W reverse wired
